text: w'idha qil lhwla' alkufaar almhrrimyn ma 'ahala allh: taealawa 'iilaa tanzil allah wa'iilaa rasulih lytbyn lakum alhlal walhram, qalu: ykfyna ma wrthnah ean abayina min qawl weml, ayqwlwn dhlk walaw kan abawuhum la yaelamun shyyana ay: la yfhmwn hqqana wala yerfwnh, wala yahtadun 'ilyh? fkyf ytbewnhm, walhalat hdhh? fa'iinah la yatabieuhum 'iilaa man hu ajhl minhum wa'adala sbyla
